name: Solve
description: We are Solve, an independent Minneapolis-based branding and advertising agency. We’ve been named one of the top small agencies in America. Twice. Solve is the youngest agency to ever win the Ad Age “Small Agency of the Year” award which is based on creative work, client results and business growth among independent agencies with fewer than 150 people. Solve was also named one of North America’s Top 15 most effective independent agencies by PSFK.
